dialogues.speaker: Eira, Captain of the Guard
dialogues.text: Halt! Who goes there? What brings you to our kingdom at this late hour?

dialogues.speaker: Arin, Traveler
dialogues.text: Greetings, Captain. My name is Arin, and I come seeking shelter from the storm. May I enter the kingdom for the night?

dialogues.speaker: Eira, Captain of the Guard
dialogues.text: What business do you have in our lands? We've had... issues with strangers lately.
